response.overview: Xiao Qi, born male, harbors an unrequited love for A Lei, a male fashion model. To be closer to him, Xiao Qi undergoes gender confirmation surgery and secretly moves next door, content to silently adore A Lei from the shadows. But fate twists when A Lei unexpectedly falls for her—now living as a woman—igniting a relationship built on a fragile lie. Tormented by guilt, Xiao Qi conceals her past, fearing rejection.  Enter Nai Xue, Xiao Qi’s roommate, who also desires A Lei. Consumed by jealousy, Nai Xue exposes Xiao Qi’s transgender identity, triggering A Lei’s disgust and withdrawal. Heartbroken, Xiao Qi pleads desperately to salvage their bond, only to discover A Lei has already moved on with a new girlfriend. Devastated, she vanishes from his life—a ghost of love sacrificed at the altar of truth.
response.title: Elegant Sex
